Moderation application! Looking for new mods for Flairs/Weekly Discussions Threads! Flair Suggestions are welcome as well!
WRITING.TEXT:
Hey all, as we are growing and the show is gaining popularity we would like to add more to the team to help improve the reddit experience with fun flairs and other goodies.
[Click here to send us a message and title Mod Application with the role you are aiming for!](http://www.reddit.com/message/compose?to=%2Fr%2FiZombie)
So here are the requirements for the two positions maybe more!
**Flairs and other goodies!**
1) Experience in CSS/Photoshop is needed as you will be creating flairs and Snoos to implement them into the page.
2) Please send us sample sizes of some of the flairs you have created - 15x15px and 20x20px is the norm for the flair image sizes.
3) How crazy are you about the show? Crazy enough to turn into mindless zombie mod??
4) Love for the show! How much time you spend on this subreddit and wanted to help out with the subreddit? here is your chance!
**Weekly Discussions Threads**
1) Ability to create weekly discussions and monitor the threads to eliminate the spoiler.
2) Creating a discussion thread 1 hour before the episode air and creating a post-episode discussion thread before the episode ends and filtering out the spoilers.
3) Willingness to become a mindless Zombie mod.
4) Love for the show! How much time you spend on this subreddit and wanted to help out with the subreddit? here is your chance!
P.S: Remember, mods are volunteers that just love the show so send applications!
If you want to contribute to flairs as well, post your suggestions here!
Thanks guys!

Regarding the International shipping for GITD Yellow Jacket Amazon exclusive
WRITING.TEXT:
Regarding the Yellow Jacket Amazon exclusive for Canadian at least.
Alright, so I decided to talk to the Amazon.com Customer service to see if the shipping date was an error or just back ordered but seems like it is correct.
The guy I was talking to upgraded my order from Standard to Global Priority shipping and waived off my shipping so I got upgraded shipping and free shipping!
The shipping date went from Nov 11th-18th to Nov 3rd-5th. My order went from $36.36 to $29.38 with upgraded free shipping.
I ordered it on May 28th since that was the date they offered International Shipping.
Who knows, maybe it might change to July and I just got free shipping and Priority shipping upgrade for free as well : )

WRITING.TITLE: S01E13 "Blaine's World" Episode Discussion
WRITING.TEXT:
#**Episode S01E13 FINALE Discussion**
^"Blaine's ^World" ___
Original air date - 9/8c June 9th, 2015 ___
After discovering new evidence in the Max Rager case, Liv and Clive pay a visit to Vaughn Du Clark at Max Rager HQ. Ravi continues his search for a cure. Meanwhile, Blaine makes Liv an offer she can't refuse. Lastly, Major finds himself in an unbelievable situation.
**Main Cast**
Actor | Role ---|--- [Rose McIver](http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0570860/?ref_=tt_cl_t1) | Liv Moore [Malcolm Goodwin](http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0329511/?ref_=tt_cl_t2) | Clive Babineaux [Rahul Kohli](http://www.imdb.com/name/nm3418510/?ref_=tt_cl_t3) | Dr. Ravi Chakrabarti [Molly Hagan](http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0353243/?ref_=tt_cl_t4) | Eva Moore [Nick Purcha](http://www.imdb.com/name/nm4729403/?ref_=tt_cl_t5) | Evan [David Anders](http://www.imdb.com/name/nm1044403/?ref_=tt_cl_t5) | Blaine DeBeers

#**Episode S01E12 Discussion**
^"Dead ^Rat, ^Live ^Rat, ^Brown ^Rat, ^White ^Rat" ___
Original air date - 9/8c June 2nd, 2015 ___
A group of drunken teenagers take a late night joyride with disasters consequences. As they cover up the accident, the man mysteriously comes back to life and attacks one of the girls. After Liv consumes the girls brain, she is taken back to high school as she and Clive investigate the case. A surprise death of one of the victims friends raises some serious questions about the case. Major believes Blaines deli is not all it seems to be. _____

[SPOILERS Finale!] Future of the MCU from the TV side in Phase 3
WRITING.TEXT:
Finale has been aired and we have learned all these things so far from the end of Agent of Shield season 2.
**HYDRA**
Ward is going to be the next head for the Hydra threat from the TV side in the MCU. Just like how Whitehall was the TV threat and Baron Strucker was the movie threat.
So leading up to Phase 3, Ward is going to be the Hydra head for TV while Baron Zemo is going to be the Hydra head for the movies.
**Mister Hyde**
We got a nod of Mister Hyde aka Cal but he has gone through the Tahiti project and is now living his live as a Vet.
**Inhumans**
Terrigen crystals were released into the ocean and the fish that got the Terrigen mist got made into fish oils and are out in the public so this could be the start of the Terrigen Mist "Bomb" of the MCU.
Expect more of the Inhumans to pop up and to play a bigger role in the Phase 3.
**Secret Warriors?**
With Coulson asking Skye to build a team and lead a team with gifted individuals this could be MCU's paving way for the Secret Warriors.
Also Bobbi, Mockingbird might be getting some upgrades from the blueprints Coulson has printed out.
**Kree Invasion?**
The unknown Kree weapon has consumed Jenma, for all we know this could be setting up for War of Kree vs the Inhumans with the Terrigen Mist being released into the public.
**Star Wars Tribute**
Coulson hand got cut off.
-----
This is everything I have gathered from the Finale, let me know if I missed anything.

WRITING.TITLE: [SPOILERS Agent of SHIELD Finale!] Future of the MCU from the TV side in Phase 3
WRITING.TEXT:
Finale has been aired and we have learned all these things so far from the end of Agent of Shield season 2.
**HYDRA**
Ward is going to be the next head for the Hydra threat from the TV side in the MCU. Just like how Whitehall was the TV threat and Baron Strucker was the movie threat.
So leading up to Phase 3, Ward is going to be the Hydra head for TV while Baron Zemo is going to be the Hydra head for the movies.
**Mister Hyde**
We got a nod of Mister Hyde aka Cal but he has gone through the Tahiti project and is now living his live as a Vet.
**Inhumans**
Terrigen crystals were released into the ocean and the fish that got the Terrigen mist got made into fish oils and are out in the public so this could be the start of the Terrigen Mist "Bomb" of the MCU.
Expect more of the Inhumans to pop up and to play a bigger role in the Phase 3.
**Secret Warriors?**
With Coulson asking Skye to build a team and lead a team with gifted individuals this could be MCU's paving way for the Secret Warriors.
Coulson folder was named [Caterpillars](http://i.imgur.com/KhzxO3j.jpg) which is indeed the code name for [Secret Warriors](http://marvel.wikia.com/Caterpillars_%28Earth-616%29)
Also Bobbi, Mockingbird might be getting some tech upgrades ~~from the blueprints Coulson has printed out~~ if they decide to make sure she stays in the field as Mockingbird.
**Kree Invasion?**
The unknown Kree weapon has consumed Jenma, for all we know this could be setting up for War of Kree vs the Inhumans with the Terrigen Mist being released into the public.
**Star Wars Tribute**
Coulson hand got cut off.
-----
This is everything I have gathered from the Finale, let me know if I missed anything.

WRITING.TITLE: S01E09 "Patriot Brains" Episode Discussion
WRITING.TEXT:
#**Episode S01E9 Discussion**
^"Patriot ^Brains" ___
Original air date - 9/8c May 12th, 2015 ___
Liv and Clive investigate the mysterious death of a former sniper, Everett, who has been working as an instructor at a paintball facility. They begin questioning family members including Everetts ex-wife and her new husband Sean and realize things are not what they seem. Meanwhile, Major continues to get closer and closer to the truth, and Blaine does the unthinkable. ____
Directed by - [Guy Bee](http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0066218/) Written by - [Rob Forman](http://www.imdb.com/name/nm3540887/) _____
**Main Cast**

#**Episode S01E8 Discussion**
^"Dead ^Air" ___

Liv and Clive work together to solve the murder of a morning radio talk show host who specialized in relationship straight talk. Liv becomes filled to the brim with insight after consuming the brains, making Clive extremely uncomfortable when Liv starts getting personal. Meanwhile, Peyton steps in to help Major, and Blaine issues a warning. Lastly, Ravis unexpected romantic connection has the potential to make things awkward for Liv.

WRITING.TITLE: [AoU/AoS Spoilers] Anybody else disappointed with how " __ "
WRITING.TEXT:
Anybody else disappointed with how the Hydra heads are so underused and "killed off" easily just because the entire 3 phases are leading towards Thanos?
**Hydra Heads:**
**Red Skull** although has a possiblity coming back in the Infinity War with the theory of how the Infinity Stones actually absorbed the big bads in the movies - Red Skull, Malekith, Ronan and Ultron.
But the other two heads:
**Whitehall aka the Kraken** in the comic book got "killed" off in AoS even though he has Skye's mother DNA in him which would make him almost immortal.
And **Baron Von Strucker** got killed off by Ultron just because Ultron was sending a message. I wanted to see more of his experimentation and such but now List has to continue Hydra head.
Whitehall and Red Skull could make a come back in the future but I don't know how Baron Von Strucker can come back.
I really wanted the Hydra heads to stay alive because they can actually oppose an ongoing threat to SHIELD and to the street level heroes but they get rid of them so early and easily it is disappointing that we don't get to see them develop into their comic counterparts.
Now people might say for Hydra, there will always be another leader! "Cut off one head, two shall take its place" but it isn't right for them to throw away such interesting Hydra heads without development.
Anybody else feel the same? I feel like all the "minor" villains are just getting killed off because they don't want to drag them on and focus on Thanos.
Kind of understand their point but so many villains are so underused.
Just my rant with how MCU handles villains.
Hopefully they will change this once the Infinity Story line is done.
**tl;dr**: MCU just throws away and kill off interesting villains before they can get real development to not confuse the viewers and drag on villains so they can focus on Thanos, just a rant.

[S02E19] Spoiler! Is nobody else worried that Ward is using [Redacted]?
WRITING.TEXT:
Ward had Sunil Bakshi under his control and had Bakshi's allegiance under him from Hydra's. He was using Johann Fennhoff aka Doctor Faustus's mind control technique which Whitehall used.
As a mercenary type of a guy, that is very dangerous and useful at the same time.
I like to think of Ward as Deadpool esq in the MCU.

WRITING.TITLE: S01E07 " Maternity Liv" Episode Discussion
WRITING.TEXT:
#**Episode S01E7 Discussion**
^"Maternity ^Liv" ___
Original air date - 9/8c April 28th, 2015 ___
A group of teens get a scare when a disheveled young pregnant woman approaches them muttering for help. Unfortunately, the woman doesnt survive but her baby does. Liv and Clive begin questioning suspects in her murder, and after consuming the victims brain, a fierce maternal instinct kicks in for Liv. Meanwhile, Major makes a shocking discovery. Rahul Kohli and David Anders also star.
____
Directed by - [Patrick Norris](http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0606845/) Written by - [Bob Dearden](http://www.imdb.com/name/nm2076074/) _____
**Main Cast**

Coming Soon: New Classic Pop! Star Wars Series!
SPOILER ALERT! First Look at the Funko Marvel Collector Corps!
S01E05 "Virtual Reality Bites" Episode Discussion
WRITING.TEXT:
#**Episode S01E6 Discussion** Sorry, this is episode 6 not 5!
^"Virtual ^Reality ^Bites" ___
Original air date - 9/8c April 21st, 2015 ___ Liv , Clive and Ravi work together to investigate the murder of a computer-hacker. Liv inherits intense agoraphobia after consuming his brains along with mad skills at computer gaming. This delights Ravi, who urges her to play and offers to help her from inside the game, as they continue to search for the killer. Meanwhile, Blaine becomes acquainted with someone close to Liv.
____
Directed by - [Dermott Downs](http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0236173/) Written by - [Gloria Calderon Kellett](http://www.imdb.com/name/nm1260853/) _____
**Main Cast**

WRITING.TITLE: Story of how I ended up with 2 The Joker Batman-Batman exclusives Pops and 1 Damaged Box from 1 lootcrate order!
WRITING.TEXT:
[The image of them](http://i.imgur.com/1ca9jg8.jpg)
Lootcrate customer service is awesome!
So I ordered the December Lootcrate box when it was on sale and received it 2 weeks ago and the Joker Batman-Batman box was came damaged and dinged up so I decided to message Lootcrate about the dinged up box and they decided to send me another box with shipment label created for the replacement Box!
I decided to look into the Pop since I am getting another box and discovered that it came with paint flaws on his head and his mouth so I messaged them again and they decided to just give me another Pop! So another shipment label was created for the replacement Pop!
I thought to myself that they would just cancel the replacement box and send me the replacement Pop! but they sent both! Now I am ended up with 2 The Joker Batman-Batman and 1 Empty box!
